website_summaries.verdict: An affordable manual trash compactor designed to take the place of a regular kitchen garbage can.
pros: The lid is touch-free, and odor control is built in
Stainless steel outer can resists smudging
When trash is manually compacted with included tool, the process is hygienic for the user
cons: Carbon odor filter must be replaced
you must initiate compaction manually with a tool

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less a day
customer_reviews.text: The pushing wand broke the same day we got it!!!! Very disappointing!!!! And the company charged us shipping to return the BROKEN product (22.00!!!!).
customer_reviews.author: Lilya Moroses

customer_reviews.title: WOW! A Big Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am impressed. I've gone from like bing in a 2,000 sq ft gone to a 31' rv. Space is much different now. This trash can is perfect for an rv, an apartment, or any small space. That's s not to say it's tiny. It's plenty good sized. Assembly was a cinch and operation equally as easy. My big trash compactor cost $700, and many cost much more. This is a value-minded product plus a money saver in trash bags. Without a compactor, I go through 3-4 trash bags a week. This should take me back to one a week.
customer_reviews.author: owl-lover

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The item is extremely heavy, and seemed very good in theory. The handle (orange things you hang the bag on did not keep the bag from sinking into the trash) amwas not a good design, and fell apart. I tried to put it together but it keeps popping apart. This is an extremely expensive garage trash receptacle now, and I still have the issues I was trying to resolve with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Trash can yup TRASH!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst trash can ever! I have ask for a refund and they say I need to send it back in original box and I pay postage. No way the plastic thing you push the trash down with broke first time and the sensor sucks and it has to be the hardest trash can to pull out the trash bag. I want full refund never been so disappointed in an Amazon product then I am today ! Don't waste your money peoe. Mine doesn't work but yet they say I am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Cosentino

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The trash can is easy to use but remember the folded arm is easy to brake if you apply to much pressure. The times I have to take it out to the trash can fore pickup is cut in half.
customer_reviews.author: James R Newson

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one week Requested return and they wanted me to pay for return. $60. No way am I paying 60 to return a broken product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer for life

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we had to make a modification to the area we planned to use this so we’re not able to keep it. I have full confidence that it would be an excellent product based on the look and hardiness of the product.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product broke the second day I had it. The plate that compacts the trash just fell off with no way to out it back on. I opened a case with the seller and they want me to pay to return their defective product. For a $140 trashcan I expect far better quality and way better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: The overall can was smaller than I thought. Very manual. Not sure I would choose this one again but it may be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: This silly trashcan saved my roommates from drowning in trash
customer_reviews.text: It's a trashcan with a plunger on the top of it. What more do you need to know? You put trash in it, and you smash it down.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A complete joke
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage wouldn’t buy it for anything the video is even patheticWould like to give it zero stars if possible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: iTouchless Squeeze Trash Compactor Garbage Can with Sensor Lid, Battery Free Operation to Compact Waste from 13 to 20 gallon Capacity, Stainless Steel, Includes AC Adapter
feature_bullets: SAVE MONEY & TIME - Buy Fewer Trash Bags. Fit Up to 50% More Trash in Every Bag! Take the Trash Out Less Often.
UNCONDITIONAL WARRANTY – You get a Full-Service Warranty including Parts and Dedicated Customer Support. Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed!
AUTOMATIC TOUCH-FREE LID – Just the motion of your hand opens the lid; no touching! Avoid exposure to illness-causing germs that live on trash cans
ODOR CONTROL – 1 Activated Carbon Odor Filter is included! Odor Filter absorbs & neutralizes odors the natural way. For a fresh & clean smelling home
INCLUDES STARTER PACK – 1 replaceable Odor Filter absorbs odors; 1 disposable Compactor Plate Cover keeps compactor plate clean; 2 Premium Trash Bags
LARGE CAPACITY & SPACE-EFFICIENT - 13 Gallons / 49 Liters. It's the perfect kitchen trash can! Space-efficient design makes it easy to place anywhere
BATTERY OR AC POWER – Powered by 4 D batteries (not included) or optional AC Adapter (included)
